SELECT BI_BOARD_SEQ.currval FROM DUAL
insert into BI_BOARD (BOARD_NO, EMP_ID,BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CREATE_DATE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_FLAG, BOARD_UPDATER, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE) values (BI_BOARD_SEQ.nextval, #{EMP_ID}, #{TITLE}, sysdate, #{CONTENT}, 'Y', NULL, NULL)
mapper.select:
select count(*) from BI_BOARD BOARD, BI_EMP EMP where BOARD.EMP_ID = EMP.EMP_ID
and BOARD.BOARD_TITLE like '%' || #{TITLE} || '%'
and EMP.EMP_NAME like '%' || #{ID} || '%'
order by BOARD_NO desc

select BOARD_NO as NO, EMP_NAME, BOARD_TITLE as TITLE, BOARD_CREATE_DATE as CREATE_DATE, BOARD_CONTENT as CONTENT, BOARD_FLAG as FLAG, BOARD_UPDATER as UPDATER, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE as UPDATE_DATE from ( select BOARD.BOARD_NO, EMP.EMP_NAME, BOARD.EMP_ID, BOARD.BOARD_TITLE, BOARD.BOARD_CREATE_DATE, BOARD.BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD.BOARD_FLAG, BOARD.BOARD_UPDATER, BOARD.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, row_number() over (order by BOARD_NO desc) rn from BI_BOARD BOARD, BI_EMP EMP where BOARD.EMP_ID = EMP.EMP_ID
and BOARD.BOARD_TITLE like '%' || #{TITLE} || '%'
and EMP.EMP_NAME like '%' || #{ID} || '%'
) where rn >= #{beginIndex} and rn <= #{endIndex} and BOARD_FLAG = 'Y' order by BOARD_NO desc

select BOARD.BOARD_NO, EMP.EMP_NAME, BOARD.EMP_ID, BOARD.BOARD_TITLE, BOARD.BOARD_CREATE_DATE, BOARD.BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD.BOARD_FLAG, BOARD.BOARD_UPDATER, BOARD.BOARD_UPDATE_DATE from BI_BOARD BOARD, BI_EMP EMP where BOARD.EMP_ID = EMP.EMP_ID and BOARD.BOARD_NO = #{value}
mapper.update: update BI_BOARD set BOARD_TITLE = #{TITLE}, BOARD_CONTENT = #{CONTENT}, BOARD_UPDATER = #{UPDATER}, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE where BOARD_NO = #{NO}
